summary: Allows you to summon a Spriggan to fight for you.
descriptionHtml:
Allows you to summon a Spriggan to fight for you. It's an apprentice-level mod and lasts 2 minutes instead of the normal 1. The spell is available in 2 places:

1. Whiterun- Belethors General Goods, can be bought from Belethor.
2. College of Winterhold- in the hall of attainment, on one of the end table in the dragonborns room.

If you have any questions or any problems, don't be afraid to leave a comment. Thanks guys and enjoy!
author: cooldude7770
